---
title: chocolate raspberry yogurt - homemade method
ingredients: |-
  * 1﻿/2 C greek yogurt
  * 2﻿ T maple syrup
  * 1﻿/2 lemon zest
  * 1﻿ c raspberries
  * 1﻿ C dark chocolate chips
  * 1﻿ T coconut oil
directions: >-
  1. L﻿ine a baking sheet with baking paper.  In a medium bowl, whisk yogurt,
  maple syrup and lemon zest.

  2. S﻿tir in raspberrries.

  3. D﻿rop bite sized clusters onto prepared sheet pan.

  4. F﻿reeze for 2 hours.

  5. M﻿elt chocolate and coconut oil in a bouble boiler, or in the microwave in 30 second intervals, stirring in between.

  6. D﻿ip frozen clusters into melted chocolate, using 2 forks to flip them around to ensure complete coverage.  Work quickly.  

  7. P﻿lace covered clusters back on pan.  Place in the icebox to harden for 5-10 minutes.
category: dessert
totalTime: 2 hours
servings: 12 pieces
rating: 4
ease: easy
needsMarinade: false
thumbnail: data:image/jpeg;base64,
---
